content:
CLAIRE and AIhub partner to launch focus series on “AI for Good”
We are excited to announce that, in partnership with CLAIRE, AIhub.org (https://aihub.org/) will be launching a focus series on “AI for Good” which will specifically concentrate on AI research relating to the UN sustainable development goals (SDGs). Each month we will focus on a different one of the goals and highlight work in that area by researchers in the field.
To start the series, we will focus on the SDG “good health and well-being”.

Are you interested in getting involved?
We are looking for researchers who work in healthcare and AI who are interested in writing or talking about their work. You could write (or describe on video) a short blog post about your research, write an opinion piece about an area of current interest, give a tutorial, or take part in an interview. If you are interested, please do get in touch at aihuborg@gmail.com.

About AIhub.org
AIhub.org is a non-profit dedicated to connecting the AI community to the public by providing free, high-quality information. We are supported by a number of leading AI organisations: CLAIRE, AAAI, NeurIPS, ICML, AIJ/IJCAI, ACM SIGAI, and RoboCup.

ΑΙhub | Connecting the AI community and the world.
AI hub is a non-profit online communication platform that brings together experts in AI research, start-ups, business, and education from around the world.
ΑΙhub | Connecting the AI community and the world.
AI hub is a non-profit online communication platform that brings together experts in AI research, start-ups, business, and education from around the world.

Last month CLAIRE successfully started its collaboration with AIhub on the “AI for Good” focus series. You can find the published articles here: https://aihub.org/category/articles/

Since the AIhub finds the SDG topic “good health and well-being” very crutial, they decided to prolong it for another month.

Are you interested in getting involved?

We are looking for researchers who work in healthcare and AI who are interested in writing or talking about their work. You could write (or describe on video) a short blog post about your research, write an opinion piece about an area of current interest, give a tutorial, or take part in an interview. If you are interested, please do get in touch at aihuborg@gmail.com.

articles | ΑΙhub

The latest from the CLAIRE and AIhub focus series on “AI for Good”

We are excited to announce that the CLAIRE - AIhub.org focus series on "AI for Good: UN sustainable development goals" is now well underway. This series highlights AI research relating to the UN sustainable development goals (SDGs). Each month we focus on a different UN SDG.

Our first UN SDG: good health and well-being
We have published a number of articles on the UN SDG of "good health and well-being". This includes contributions from the CLAIRE COVID-19 task force. We have more excellent articles to come during January (including more from the CLAIRE COVID-19 task force). You can find the articles published so far collected here: https://aihub.org/tag/focus-on-good-health-and-well-being/

Our next UN SDG: climate action - please get in touch if you are interested in contributing!
We are looking for researchers who work in AI relating to climate action who are interested in writing or talking about their work. You could write (or describe on video) a short blog post about your research, write an opinion piece about an area of current interest, give a tutorial, or take part in an interview. If you are interested, please do get in touch at aihuborg@gmail.com. The deadline for contributions is 12 February 2021.

About AIhub.org
AIhub.org is a non-profit dedicated to connecting the AI community to the public by providing free, high-quality information. We are supported by a number of leading AI organisations: CLAIRE, AAAI, NeurIPS, ICML, AIJ/IJCAI, ACM SIGAI, and RoboCup.

ΑΙhub | Connecting the AI community and the world.
AI hub is a non-profit online communication platform that brings together experts in AI research, start-ups, business, and education from around the world.
Focus on good health and well-being | ΑΙhub

Call for contributions - AIhub AI for Good series - quality education

UN SDG for March is: quality education
AIhub is looking for researchers who work in AI relating to education who are interested in writing or talking about their work. This topic allows for number of interpretations, from teaching of AI itself (at all levels of education and to the general public), showing ways how to increase the number of people with relevant skills to using AI methods to improve education and many others.
You could write (or describe on video) a short blog post about your research, write an opinion piece about an area of current interest, give a tutorial, or take part in an interview.
This is a great way how to make your work more visible within the AI comunity and to the wide public as well.

:point_right: If you are interested, please do get in touch at aihuborg@gmail.com
:calendar: deadline for contributions is 9 March 2021

There is still time to contribute to February´s topic: climate action
:point_right: If you are interested in contributing do not hesitate to contact aihuborg@gmail.com
:calendar: deadline for contributions is 12 February 2021

ΑΙhub | Connecting the AI community and the world.
AI hub is a non-profit online communication platform that brings together experts in AI research, start-ups, business, and education from around the world.

Call for contributions - AIhub AI for Good series - life below water

UN SDG for April is: life below water
AIhub is looking for researchers who work in AI relating to education who are interested in writing or talking about their work. This topic allows for number of interpretations, from teaching of AI itself (at all levels of education and to the general public), showing ways how to increase the number of people with relevant skills to using AI methods to improve education and many others.
You could write (or describe on video) a short blog post about your research, write an opinion piece about an area of current interest, give a tutorial, or take part in an interview.
This is a great way how to make your work more visible within the AI comunity and to the wide public as well.

:point_right: If you are interested, please do get in touch at aihuborg@gmail.com
:calendar: deadline for contributions is 16 April 2021

There is still time to contribute to March topic: quality education
:point_right: If you are interested in contributing do not hesitate to contact aihuborg@gmail.com
:calendar: deadline for contributions is 9 March 2021

As many of you may know, CLAIRE as a AIhub partner is more than happy to collaborate on the AI for Good series.

This time we bring you summary article for February SDG topic - Climate Action:
https://aihub.org/2021/03/16/climate-action-focus-series-round-up-interviews-research-summaries-webinars-and-more/

:clap: Among others you can read there one of CLAIRE supporters @Beril Sirmacek (Jonkoping University, SE) article on Observing air quality and flow in cities for public health in times of climate change.

:soon: Call for contributions for the upcoming SDG topic is coming soon! (Hint: is has something to do with equality)

There is still time to contribute to April topic: life below water
:point_right: If you are interested, please do get in touch at aihuborg@gmail.com
:calendar: deadline for contributions is 16 April 2021
